sentences.cn: …当国与国之间为领土而争执不断时。

sentences.en: As for some things all right to quarrel and bicker about, but fundamental cooperation is needed.
sentences.cn: 在一些事情上有点争吵也无妨, 但是必需在根本问题上实行合作.

sentences.en: Bicker: To engage in a petty, bad - tempered quarrel; squabble.
sentences.cn: 发生口角: 因坏脾气引起的小的争吵; 为琐事争吵.

sentences.en: I went into medicine to care for patients, not to waste time bickering over budgets.
sentences.cn: 我从医是为了治病救人，不是为了预算争吵而浪费时间。

sentences.en: I wish you two would stop bickering.
sentences.cn: 我希望你们俩不要吵了。

sentences.en: Likes the nature the breath, the creek murmur bicker, the bird sounds.
sentences.cn: 喜欢大自然的气息, 小河潺潺流水声, 鸟儿鸣叫.

sentences.en: The election will end months of political bickering.
sentences.cn: 这场选举将结束几个月以来的政治争论。

sentences.en: The two brothers always bicker about whose turn it is to wash the dishes.
sentences.cn: 那两兄弟总是为谁该洗盘子而争吵.

sentences.en: The two children used to bicker about who should do the washing - up.
sentences.cn: 这两个小孩子过去常为该由谁洗餐具一事而争吵.

sentences.en: They always bicker when they meet at school.
sentences.cn: 在学校见面时他们总是争吵.

sentences.en: We began to bicker and argue.
We bicker over household chores and who forgot to turn off the coffee machine.
sentences.cn: 我们经常会为一些烦琐的家务事而争吵,比如有人忘记关上咖啡机.

sentences.en: We bicker with each other, we love working with each other.
sentences.cn: 我们互相吵嘴, 我们很喜欢和对方合作.

trans.tran_en: When people bicker, they argue or quarrel about unimportant things

trans.tran_cn: 争吵，口角，（水等）作潺潺声，闪烁
